name: TheAtlantic
text: "Teachers signed up to be a positive adult presence in children’s lives, and to help them grow up with their peers, at school, away from home. We need them to follow through, even though it’s a challenge," Kristen McConnell writes: https://t.co/HJPB8WaLPQ

name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen to Senator Chris Coons discuss a Civilian Conservation Corps for the pandemic era on the "Social Distance" podcast. https://t.co/ob0g1S0Bji

name: TheAtlantic
text: Los Angeles has an ambitious program to use tree-planting as an axis to connect job-creation, climate sustainability, urban renewal, and economic equity and inclusion, @JamesFallows writes: https://t.co/RH0TqAWoJT

name: TheAtlantic
text:
One year ago, India revoked Kashmir’s autonomous status, throwing the region into lockdown.

“It wasn’t always a bad relationship with the army,” a young Kashmiri told @anchalvohra last fall. “Now I see them as an enemy." https://t.co/S6QY5kmmwG

name: TheAtlantic
text: Donald Trump has revealed the depths of the country’s prejudice and forced Americans to reckon with a racist system, writes @DrIbram: https://t.co/glTmzZl3Xe

name: TheAtlantic
text: “For the first time in a long time, I don’t think it really makes sense for me to have children; the future is too uncertain and the current environment too unsafe,” writes @TheSamhita: https://t.co/LPbqEEhDte
